## Resource Hub

This page curates learning resources for reproducible and ethics-aware public health data workflows.

## Current Featured Resources

- [AI-assisted Data Cleaning Workflow](ai_with_r.qmd)
  End-to-end R workflow for AI-assisted cleaning, labeling, and export.

- [Community](community.qmd)
  Discussion space for implementation questions and peer support.

- [Transparency](transparency.qmd)
  Legal framework and current operational status.

## Upcoming Resource Tracks

- Research protocol templates
- Data governance and ethics templates
- Monitoring and evaluation toolkits
- Grant and CSR collaboration documentation

## Recommended Use Path

1. Prepare de-identified datasets
2. Use structured templates for cleaning and validation
3. Review all AI-assisted code before execution
4. Document assumptions and decisions
5. Export reproducible outputs with data dictionaries
